content.title: Mukhya Mantri Mahila Nirman Shramik Sammaan Yojana (HBOCWWB)
content.beneficiary: Registered female workers in building and construction work
content.details: The scheme 'Mukhya Mantri Mahila Nirman Shramik Sammaan Yojana' is implemented by the Haryana Building and Other Construction Workers Welfare Board (HBOCWWB). Under this scheme, registered female workers, who have a minimum of one year’s regular membership, are being provided financial assistance of ₹5100/- for the purchase of Saree, Suit, Slippers, Raincoat, Umbrella, Sanitary Napkin, and Kitchen utensils, etc. This benefit is given every year at the time of renewal of the membership.
benefits: Financial assistance of ₹5100/- for the purchase of Saree, Suit, Slippers, Raincoat, Umbrella, Sanitary Napkin, and Kitchen utensils.
eligibility: The applicant should be a woman engaged in building or construction work.
The applicants should be registered with the Haryana Building & Other Construction Workers Welfare Board.
The registered woman worker must have a minimum one-year regular membership.
The benefit of this scheme will be given to the registered female worker on renewal of her membership every year.
documents_required: Identity proof i.e. Aadhaar Card, Voter Card

faqs.question: What benefits does the scheme offer?
faqs.answer: Registered female workers receive financial assistance of ₹5100 for purchasing items like Saree, Suit, Slippers, Raincoat, Umbrella, Sanitary Napkin, and Kitchen utensils.

faqs.question: Who is eligible to avail of these benefits?
faqs.answer: Women engaged in building or construction work who are registered with the Haryana Building & Other Construction Workers Welfare Board are eligible. Additionally, they must have at least one year of regular membership.

faqs.question: How often are the benefits provided?
faqs.answer: The benefits are given annually at the time of renewal of membership.

faqs.question: How can a construction worker register under HBOCWWB?
faqs.answer: They can visit the Official Website of the Labour Department Haryana to complete the registration process.

faqs.question: Where can one apply for the scheme?
faqs.answer: To apply, visit the Official Portal - Antyodaya-SARAL Portal.

faqs.question: What documents are required for registration?
faqs.answer: Documents such as proof of registration with HBOCWWB and an undertaking along with list of items, price, source and date of purchase.

faqs.question: Is this scheme for only for women?
faqs.answer: Yes, this scheme is only for women.

faqs.question: Can a general category worker be eligible to apply under this scheme?
faqs.answer: Yes, this scheme is for all categories of women workers.

faqs.question: Is there any registration fee needed while registering under HBOCWWB?
faqs.answer: Registration fee ₹25/- once in life-time and ₹5/- per month (₹60/-P.A) as subscription fee shall be paid to the Board by the beneficiary.
